Label.description: A special class of lexical entities.
Label.label: Label

altLabel.description: If C skosxl:altLabel L and L skosxl:literalForm V, then X skos:altLabel V.
altLabel.label: alternative label

hiddenLabel.description: If C skosxl:hiddenLabel L and L skosxl:literalForm V, then C skos:hiddenLabel V.
hiddenLabel.label: hidden label

labelRelation.description: skosxl:labelRelation is not intended to be used directly, but rather as the basis for a design pattern which can be refined for more specific labeling scenarios.
labelRelation.label: label relation

literalForm.description: If two instances of the class skosxl:Label have the same literal form, they are not necessarily the same resource.
literalForm.label: literal form

prefLabel.description: If C skosxl:prefLabel L and L skosxl:literalForm V, then X skos:prefLabel V.
prefLabel.label: preferred label
